attributes.action: Remove all of the Monarchs prerogative powers.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure exactly which powers, for example which "domestic powers", you're concerned about. Some of the powers you've mentioned are not prerogative powers, for example dissolution is now a statutory provision under the Fixed-term Parliaments Act 2011. We're also not sure to whom you want to transfer existing prerogative powers.

You can find out more here:

https://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/SN03861/SN03861.pdf

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
